input.sentences: on the day of the birthday party we all dressed up in hats .
my son wrote a letter of what he wanted for his birthday .
we also sat down and got ready to eat some food .
the pie was brought and and almost ready to be eaten .
the kids were all very excited about the food at the party .
output.sentences: Today we went to a pioneer party and we dressed in in pioneer clothes and hats.
The hostess even set up an old desk with a feather pen where my son sat down and wrote a letter.
When dinner was ready we sat down ready to eat pioneer food.
Once the main course was eaten we were all ready for the pie made from scratch.
The kids favorite things about the party was the food of course.
